Class FTPSSocketFactory

java.lang.Object
javax.net.SocketFactory
org.apache.commons.net.ftp.FTPSSocketFactory
public class FTPSSocketFactory extends SocketFactory
Socket factory for FTPS connections.
Since:
2.0
